summary: Internet Computer app with backend canister reliability issues and Excel import workflow; current focus is keeping backend canister running reliably and updating the Excel import parser so it correctly maps the Karigar/Factory Name column instead of showing 'Unassigned'.
architectural_notes: Excel import uses header-name matching to map columns (karigar assignment depends on recognized karigar/factory header names).
Frontend currently depends heavily on backend canister availability; drafts/deployments may reuse stopped backend canisters causing 'Unable to Load Profile'.
known_issues: Karigar names show as 'Unassigned' because the import parser does not recognize the Excel column header 'Karigar/Factory Name'.
Backend canister may remain offline/stopped for long periods in draft deployments, preventing app functionality.

existing_features.title: Update the Master Designs Excel import parser to recognize the column header "Karigar/Factory Name" (and common punctuation/spacing variants that normalize to the same key) as the karigar/factory name column, so imported master design mappings populate `karigarName` instead of defaulting to "Unassigned".

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Excel import parser to recognize 'Karigar/Factory Name' (and similar variants) as the karigar name column so rows can be assigned correctly without renaming the Excel header.
Support launching/deploying the app with a fresh backend canister to avoid drafts pointing to an offline/stopped backend and improve backend availability.

projectName: Accept 'Karigar/Factory Name' column in Master Designs Excel import parser
